thread.title: On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion

title: On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion
text:
On board: Ryanair to buy major stake in Laudamotion 10:41pm IST - 01:07 
Ryanair has agreed to buy a majority stake in the new Austrian leisure airline founded by former motor racing champion Niki Lauda in a major push on the German and Austrian markets dominated by Lufthansa. Kate King reports.   
Ryanair has agreed to buy a majority stake in the new Austrian leisure airline founded by former motor racing champion Niki Lauda in a major push on the German and Austrian markets dominated by Lufthansa. Kate King reports.  //reut.rs/2IGcp7Y
